author: mikeprior12345
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what the problem is that the new feature would solve.
Try formulating it in user story style (if applicable):
'As a user I want to be able to download MS binaries for azure cli/powershell, without waiting for hours.
-->

## Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

<!-- 
Don't put binaries to download on your site, which has sh1t download performance. Put them on mirror sites, and put links in Github
-->

comments.author: mikeprior12345
comments.body: it takes hours to download azure-cli/powershell binaries/installers from github pages. Can these downloads be put on proper infrastructure/mirrored sites, without having end users messing about with vpns, to get decent downloads from github to work.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: If you have an issue with GitHub it is better to open a ticket in GitHub support.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Please don't put msi/binaries on Github
